item.title: Report X-2024080626
item.description:
Report X-2024080626

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-12T15:14:41+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-02
  • City: WICHITA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SPA PERSON NOTICED LEAKING PACKAGE ON BELT AND CALLED RESPONDER. RESPONDER DISCOVERED CORRUGATED BOX WITH LIMITED QUANTITY DOT-SP21607 SU13644, AMAZON BOX EDGE CRUSH 26, AMAZON SECURITY REINFORCED TAPE. THERE WERE 12 AEROSOLS INSIDE, ORIENTATED ON THEIR SIDES, CONTAINED IN SEVERAL ZIPLOCK BAGS. ALL CANS WERE SOILED AND 6 HAD LOOSE LIDS. THERE WAS A SINGLE SHEET OF KRAFT PAPER ON TOP.
